abstract: The health insurance industry likes to cite figures showing that 87 cents of every dollar in premiums is spent on medical claims.

abstract: The Finger family of Texas, a large Bank of America shareholder, filed a notice Tuesday with the Securities and Exchange Commission calling on Kenneth D. Lewis, the bank’s chief executive, to recuse himself from any involvement in the board’s choice of his successor.
